title: Porno
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: On the subject of sex monsters: on Tuesday afternoon we met one, a real one. It was a surprisingly mild day and the three of us were sitting outside the Pear Tree, having a lager, when this sleazy creep approached us and sat down at our table. — Good afternoon, girls, he said, sitting his pint on the end of the bench.

title: Porno
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: — Get away, Dianne says, — that jakey in the Pear Tree last week, now that was harassment. This is romance! Think yourself lucky, hen.

title: Porno
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: — Good afternoon, girls, he said, sitting his pint on the end of the bench. That's the problem with the Pear Tree, the beer garden fills up quickly and the benches are long, so you often end up with somebody you don't want to sit next to. — You don't mind me sitting here, do you, he asked, harsh and arrogant.
